text: Ebb Tide is a 1922 American silent adventure movie directed by George Melford and is the adaption of the 1894 novel of the same name by Robert Louis Stevenson. It stars Lila Lee, James Kirkwood, Raymond Hatton, George Fawcett, Noah Beery, Jacqueline Logan and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * * Category:1922 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by George Melford Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Oceania
title: Ebb Tide (1922 movie)
